name: Extinction: Alien Invasion
description: Annihilate waves of aliens, build your base, improve your mercenary, do it all with a sound track bathed in rock. Extinction Alien Invasion is an arcade shooter with elements of RPG, inspired by games like: Dead nation, Shadowgrounds, Alien Breed and Alien Swarm.
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows 7 Процессор: Core i3 Оперативная память: 4 GB ОЗУ Видеокарта: Geforce GT 640 DirectX: Версии 11 Место на диске: 2 GB
